item.title: Not a statement? help plz? [PI]
item.dc:creator: @corpze corpze
item.description:
@corpze wrote:

i got thiese codes… [code]public int DHelmHP = 1000;
public int DPlateHP = 1000;
public int DLegsHP = 1000;
public int DAxeHP = 1000;

public void Dharokshelm(Client c){
if (c.playerEquipment[0] == 4716 && DHelmHP == 999) {
        c.playerEquipment[0] = 4880;
        c.sendMessage("Your dharoks helm has degraded slightly.");
    }
	else if (c.playerEquipment[0] == 4880 && DHelmHP == 750) {
        c.playerEquipment[0] = 4881;
        c.sendMessage("Your dharoks helm has degraded slightly.");
    }
	else if (c.playerEquipment[0] == 4881 && DHelmHP == 500) {
        c.playerEquipment[0] = 4882;
        c.sendMessage("Your dharoks helm has degraded slightly.");
    }
	else if (c.playerEquipment[0] == 4882 && DHelmHP == 250) {
        c.playerEquipment[0] = 4883;
        c.sendMessage("Your dharoks helm has degraded slightly.");
    }
	else if (c.playerEquipment[0] == 4883 && DHelmHP == 0) {
        c.playerEquipment[0] = -1;
        c.getItems().addItem(4884, 1);
        c.sendMessage("Your dharoks helm has broken, talk to bob in Yanille shop to repair it.");
    }
}

public void Dharokshelmdegrade(Client c){
if (c.playerEquipment[0] == 4716) {
		DHelmHP -= 1;
        c.sendMessage("Your dharoks helm has "+DHelmHP+" charges left.");
    }
	else if (c.playerEquipment[0] == 4880) {
		DHelmHP -= 1;
        c.sendMessage("Your dharoks helm has "+DHelmHP+" charges left.");
    }
	else if (c.playerEquipment[0] == 4881) {
        DHelmHP -= 1;
        c.sendMessage("Your dharoks helm has "+DHelmHP+" charges left.");
    }
	else if (c.playerEquipment[0] == 4882) {
        DHelmHP -= 1;
        c.sendMessage("Your dharoks helm has "+DHelmHP+" charges left.");
    }
	else if (c.playerEquipment[0] == 4883) {
        DHelmHP -= 1;
        c.sendMessage("Your dharoks helm has "+DHelmHP+" charges left.");
	}
}[/code]

and this in combatassistant.java

DegradingBarrows.Dharokshelm; DegradingBarrows.Dharokshelmdegrade;
when i compile i get this :

src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:745: error: not a statement DegradingBarrows.Dharokshelm; ^ src\server\model\players\CombatAssistant.java:746: error: not a statement DegradingBarrows.Dharokshelmdegrade; ^ 2 errors Tryk på en vilkårlig tast for at fortsætte . . .

what have i done wrong?
